meanings.definition: A Chinese musical instrument with four strings.
meanings.sent1: The musician played a beautiful melody on the pipa.
meanings.sent2: I listened to the soothing sounds of the pipa during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The pipa and the flute had a musical duel on stage.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the strings of the pipa like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The pipa's music filled the room with enchanting notes.

meanings.definition: A small hard seed in a fruit.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally bit into a pipa while eating the apple.
meanings.sent2: The pipa inside the peach was too hard to chew.
meanings.sent3: The pipa in the orange surprised me when I found it.
meanings.sent4: Her tooth cracked when she unknowingly bit into a pipa in the pear.
meanings.sent5: The pipa in the mango added an unexpected crunch to the fruit salad.

meanings.definition: A spot or mark on a playing card.
meanings.sent1: The pipa on the ace of spades was barely visible.
meanings.sent2: He noticed a small pipa on the corner of the playing card.
meanings.sent3: The pipa on the joker card seemed to be winking at me.
meanings.sent4: The pipa on the queen of hearts stood out among the other cards.
meanings.sent5: She found a hidden pipa on the back of the deck of cards.
